actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend section 901(a) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to provide that such section shall not apply to events in which participation is limited to parents of either sex and the children of either sex.

summary.text: Exempts from the sex discrimination provisions of the Education Amendments of 1972, education programs or activities in which participation is limited to parents of either sex and those parents' children of either sex.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 901(a) of the Education Amendments of 1972 to provide that such section shall not apply to events in which participation is limited to parents of either sex and the children of either sex.
